price: 68. Mpo nakomisela bino sango ya Nkolo wa ngai, mpe nazali mopesi toli malamu тропа bino.
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anā lakum nāṣiḥun amīnun
